name: Lands of Ambustio
description:
Welcome to Ambustio! Where the sea shines and the mountains are high! Follow Ohmar and his friends on their mad quest to get the last piece of the puzzle that will allow them to bring back to life their loved ones who died tragically when an abyss suddenly opened beneath their hometown. Will they succeed in their quest? Only you can help them!
